static void requestTapjoyConnect(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String appID, java.lang.String secretKey)
          Performs the Tapjoy Connect call to the Tapjoy server to notify it that this device is running your application.

This method should be called in the onCreate() method of your first activity and before any other TapjoyConnect methods.

          Performs the Tapjoy Connect call to the Tapjoy server to notify it that this device is running your application.

This method should be called in the onCreate() method of your first activity and before any other TapjoyConnect methods.

For special flags, this is a hashtable of special flags to send to enable non-standard settings.

requestTapjoyConnect

public static void requestTapjoyConnect(android.content.Context context,
                                        java.lang.String appID,
                                        java.lang.String secretKey)
Performs the Tapjoy Connect call to the Tapjoy server to notify it that this device is running your application.

This method should be called in the onCreate() method of your first activity and before any other TapjoyConnect methods.

Parameters:
context - The application context.
appID - Your Tapjoy APP ID.
secretKey - Your Tapjoy SECRET KEY.

requestTapjoyConnect

public static void requestTapjoyConnect(android.content.Context context,
                                        java.lang.String appID,
                                        java.lang.String secretKey,
                                        java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> flags)
Performs the Tapjoy Connect call to the Tapjoy server to notify it that this device is running your application.

This method should be called in the onCreate() method of your first activity and before any other TapjoyConnect methods.

For special flags, this is a hashtable of special flags to send to enable non-standard settings. See TapjoyConnectFlag for possible values.

Parameters:
context - The application context.
appID - Your Tapjoy APP ID.
secretKey - Your Tapjoy SECRET KEY.
flags - Special flags.

requestTapjoyConnect

public static void requestTapjoyConnect(android.content.Context context,
                                        java.lang.String appID,
                                        java.lang.String secretKey,
                                        java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> flags,
                                        com.tapjoy.TapjoyConnectNotifier notifier)
Performs the Tapjoy Connect call to the Tapjoy server to notify it that this device is running your application.

This method should be called in the onCreate() method of your first activity and before any other TapjoyConnect methods.

For special flags, this is a hashtable of special flags to send to enable non-standard settings. See TapjoyConnectFlag for possible values.

Implement TapjoyConnectNotifier to receive callbacks on connect success or failure.

Parameters:
context - The application context.
appID - Your Tapjoy APP ID.
secretKey - Your Tapjoy SECRET KEY.
flags - Special flags.
notifier - Notifier for connect success/failure.

public static TapjoyConnect getTapjoyConnectInstance()
Returns the singleton instance of TapjoyConnect.

Returns:
Singleton instance of TapjoyConnect.

setUserID

public void setUserID(java.lang.String userID)
Assigns a user ID for this user/device.
This is used to identify the user in your application.

This is REQUIRED for NON-MANAGED currency apps.

Parameters:
userID - User ID you wish to assign to this device.

getUserID

public java.lang.String getUserID()
Gets the user ID assigned to this device. By default, this is the device ID.

Returns:
User ID assigned to this device.

getAppID

public java.lang.String getAppID()
Gets the Tapjoy App ID used to identify app.

Returns:
Tapjoy App ID used to identify app.

enablePaidAppWithActionID

public void enablePaidAppWithActionID(java.lang.String paidAppPayPerActionID)
ONLY USE FOR PAID APP INSTALLS.
This method should be called in the onCreate() method of your first activity after calling requestTapjoyConnect(Context context, String appID, String secretKey).
Must enable a paid app Pay-Per-Action on the Tapjoy dashboard. Starts a 15 minute timer. After which, will send an actionComplete call with the paid app PPA to inform the Tapjoy server that the paid install PPA has been completed.

Parameters:
paidAppPayPerActionID - The Pay-Per-Action ID for this paid app download action.

setCurrencyMultiplier

public void setCurrencyMultiplier(float multiplier)
ONLY USE FOR NON-MANAGED (by TAPJOY) CURRENCY.
Sets the multiplier for the virtual currency displayed in Offers, Banner Ads, etc. The default is 1.0

Parameters:
multiplier -

getCurrencyMultiplier

public float getCurrencyMultiplier()
Gets the multiplier for the virtual currency display.

Returns:
Currency multiplier.

setTapjoyViewNotifier

public void setTapjoyViewNotifier(TapjoyViewNotifier notifier)
Set to receive notifications when Tapjoy views open and close.

Parameters:
notifier - Notifier to receive open/close callbacks.

actionComplete

public void actionComplete(java.lang.String actionID)
Informs the Tapjoy server that the specified Pay-Per-Action was completed. Should be called whenever a user completes an in-game action.

Parameters:
actionID - The action ID of the completed action.

showOffers

public void showOffers()
Show available offers to the user.

showOffersWithCurrencyID

public void showOffersWithCurrencyID(java.lang.String currencyID,
                                     boolean enableCurrencySelector)
Show available offers using a currencyID and currency selector flag. This should only be used if the application supports multiple currencies and is NON-MANAGED by Tapjoy.

Parameters:
currencyID - ID of the currency to display.
enableCurrencySelector - Whether to display the currency selector to toggle currency.

getTapPoints

public void getTapPoints(TapjoyNotifier notifier)
Gets the virtual currency data from the server for this device. The data will be returned in a callback to updatePoints() to the class implementing the notifier.

Parameters:
notifier - The class implementing the TapjoyNotifier callback.

spendTapPoints

public void spendTapPoints(int amount,
                           TapjoySpendPointsNotifier notifier)
Spends virtual currency. This can only be used for currency managed by Tapjoy. The data will be returned in a callback to updatePoints() to the class implementing the notifier.

Parameters:
notifier - The class implementing the TapjoySpendPointsNotifier callback.

awardTapPoints

public void awardTapPoints(int amount,
                           TapjoyAwardPointsNotifier notifier)
Awards virtual currency. This can only be used for currency managed by Tapjoy. The data will be returned in a callback to getAwardPointsResponse() to the class implementing the notifier.

Parameters:
notifier - The class implementing the TapjoyAwardPointsNotifier callback.

setEarnedPointsNotifier

public void setEarnedPointsNotifier(TapjoyEarnedPointsNotifier notifier)
Sets the notifier which gets informed whenever virtual currency is earned.

Parameters:
notifier - Class implementing TapjoyEarnedPointsNotifier.

getFullScreenAd

public void getFullScreenAd(com.tapjoy.TapjoyFullScreenAdNotifier notifier)
Retrieves the Full Screen Ad data from the server. Data is returned to the callback TapjoyFullScreenAdNotifier.

Parameters:
notifier - Class implementing TapjoyFullScreenAdNotifier for the Full Screen Ad data callback.

getFullScreenAdWithCurrencyID

public void getFullScreenAdWithCurrencyID(java.lang.String currencyID,
                                          com.tapjoy.TapjoyFullScreenAdNotifier notifier)
Retrieves the Full Screen Ad data from the server. Data is returned to the callback TapjoyFullScreenAdNotifier. This should only be used if the application supports multiple currencies and is NON-MANAGED by Tapjoy.

Parameters:
currencyID - ID of the currency to award.
notifier - Class implementing TapjoyFeaturedAppNotifier for the Full Screen Ad data callback.

showFullScreenAd

public void showFullScreenAd()
Displays the Full Screen Ad fullscreen ad. Should be called after getFullScreenAd(TapjoyFullScreenAdNotifier) and after receiving the TapjoyFullScreenAdNotifier.getFullScreenAdResponse() callback.

getFeaturedApp

public void getFeaturedApp(com.tapjoy.TapjoyFeaturedAppNotifier notifier)
Deprecated. Use getFullScreenAd(TapjoyFullScreenAdNotifier) instead. Retrieves the Full Screen Ad data from the server. Data is returned to the callback TapjoyFeaturedAppNotifier.

Parameters:
notifier - Class implementing TapjoyFeaturedAppNotifier for the Full Screen Ad data callback.

getFeaturedAppWithCurrencyID

public void getFeaturedAppWithCurrencyID(java.lang.String currencyID,
                                         com.tapjoy.TapjoyFeaturedAppNotifier notifier)
Deprecated. Use getFullScreenAdWithCurrencyID(String, TapjoyFullScreenAdNotifier) instead. Retrieves the Full Screen Ad data from the server. Data is returned to the callback TapjoyFeaturedAppNotifier. This should only be used if the application supports multiple currencies and is NON-MANAGED by Tapjoy.

Parameters:
currencyID - ID of the currency to award.
notifier - Class implementing TapjoyFeaturedAppNotifier for the Full Screen Ad data callback.

Parameters:
count - The maximum number of times to display a full screen ad.

setDisplayAdSize

public void setDisplayAdSize(java.lang.String dimensions)
Sets the size (dimensions) of the banner ad. By default this is 640x100.
Supported sizes are:
TapjoyDisplayAdSize.TJC_DISPLAY_AD_SIZE_320X50
TapjoyDisplayAdSize.TJC_DISPLAY_AD_SIZE_640X100
TapjoyDisplayAdSize.TJC_DISPLAY_AD_SIZE_768X90

Parameters:
dimensions - Dimensions of the banner.

setBannerAdSize

public void setBannerAdSize(java.lang.String dimensions)
Deprecated. Use setDisplayAdSize(String) instead.

Sets the size (dimensions) of the banner ad. By default this is 640x100.
Supported sizes are:
TapjoyDisplayAdSize.TJC_AD_BANNERSIZE_320X50
TapjoyDisplayAdSize.TJC_AD_BANNERSIZE_640X100
TapjoyDisplayAdSize.TJC_AD_BANNERSIZE_768X90

Parameters:
dimensions - Dimensions of the banner.

enableDisplayAdAutoRefresh

public void enableDisplayAdAutoRefresh(boolean shouldAutoRefresh)
Enables automatic refreshing of the banner ads. Default is FALSE.

Parameters:
shouldAutoRefresh - Whether banner ad should auto-refresh or not.

enableBannerAdAutoRefresh

public void enableBannerAdAutoRefresh(boolean shouldAutoRefresh)
Deprecated. Use enableDisplayAdAutoRefresh(boolean) instead.

Enables automatic refreshing of the banner ads. Default is FALSE.

Parameters:
shouldAutoRefresh - Whether banner ad should auto-refresh or not.

getDisplayAd

public void getDisplayAd(com.tapjoy.TapjoyDisplayAdNotifier notifier)
Deprecated. No longer supported. Use getDisplayAd(Activity, TapjoyDisplayAdNotifier) instead.

Retrieves the Banner Ad data from the server. Data is returned to the callback method TapjoyDisplayAdNotifier.getDisplayAdResponse(android.view.View).

Parameters:
notifier - Class implementing TapjoyFeaturedAppNotifier for the Full Screen Ad data callback.

getDisplayAdWithCurrencyID

public void getDisplayAdWithCurrencyID(java.lang.String currencyID,
                                       com.tapjoy.TapjoyDisplayAdNotifier notifier)
Deprecated. No longer supported. Use getDisplayAdWithCurrencyID(Activity, String, TapjoyDisplayAdNotifier) instead.

Retrieves the Banner Ad data from the server. Data is returned to the callback method TapjoyDisplayAdNotifier.getDisplayAdResponse(android.view.View). This should only be used if the application supports multiple currencies and is NON-MANAGED by Tapjoy.

Parameters:
currencyID - ID of the currency to award.
notifier - Class implementing TapjoyFeaturedAppNotifier for the Full Screen Ad data callback.

getDisplayAd

public void getDisplayAd(android.app.Activity activity,
                         com.tapjoy.TapjoyDisplayAdNotifier notifier)
Retrieves the Banner Ad data from the server. Data is returned to the callback method TapjoyDisplayAdNotifier.getDisplayAdResponse(android.view.View).

Parameters:
activity - Activity where this banner will be displayed in. Required for rich media banner which may invoke an AlertDialog from within the WebView.
notifier - Class implementing TapjoyFeaturedAppNotifier for the Full Screen Ad data callback.

getDisplayAdWithCurrencyID

public void getDisplayAdWithCurrencyID(android.app.Activity activity,
                                       java.lang.String currencyID,
                                       com.tapjoy.TapjoyDisplayAdNotifier notifier)
Retrieves the Banner Ad data from the server. Data is returned to the callback method TapjoyDisplayAdNotifier.getDisplayAdResponse(android.view.View). This should only be used if the application supports multiple currencies and is NON-MANAGED by Tapjoy.

Parameters:
activity - Activity where this banner will be displayed in. Required for rich media banner which may invoke an AlertDialog from within the WebView.
currencyID - ID of the currency to award.
notifier - Class implementing TapjoyFeaturedAppNotifier for the Full Screen Ad data callback.

initVideoAd

public void initVideoAd(TapjoyVideoNotifier notifier)
Deprecated. This method now only sets the TapjoyVideoNotifier and starts caching (if allowed). Videos are initialized automatically now.

Initialize video ads so video offers can be made available via the offer wall. Call this method if you wish to enable video offers.

setVideoCacheCount

public void setVideoCacheCount(int count)
Sets the limit of number of videos to keep in cache. The default value is 5.

Parameters:
count - Number of videos to cache.

enableVideoCache

public void enableVideoCache(boolean enable)
Deprecated. This method is deprecated. Use the Tapjoy dashboard to enable or disable caching.

Parameters:
enable - TRUE to enable video caching, FALSE to disable video caching.

cacheVideos

public void cacheVideos()
Call to start caching videos (if allowed). This will depend on the device's connection type and the cache-3g/cache-wifi dashboard settings on a per-app basis.

This is not needed if the app is using only streaming video ads.

setVideoNotifier

public void setVideoNotifier(TapjoyVideoNotifier notifier)
Sets the video notifier. Use this to receive callbacks on video start, complete and error.

sendShutDownEvent

public void sendShutDownEvent()
Event to send when app shuts down.

sendIAPEvent

public void sendIAPEvent(java.lang.String name,
                         float price,
                         int quantity,
                         java.lang.String currencyCode)
Event when an In-App-Purchased occurs.

Parameters:
name - Item name.
price - Item price (real life currency).
quantity - Quantity of the item purchased.
currencyCode - Real life currency code purchase was made in.
